Package org.jscience.distributed

package org.jscience.distributed
Distributed computing support for JScience.

This package provides integration with Apache Spark and Apache Flink for large-scale scientific computing and stream processing.

Apache Spark Integration

Distributed matrix and vector operations using RDDs:

  • DistributedMatrix<T>: Matrix backed by Spark RDD
  • DistributedVector<T>: Vector backed by Spark RDD
  • Distributed linear algebra (SVD, PCA, etc.)

Apache Flink Integration

Real-time stream processing for scientific data:

  • StreamQuantity <Q>: Physical quantity streams
  • Time-series analysis on streaming data
  • Event-driven statistical computation
Since:
2.0
Author:
Silvere Martin-Michiellot, Gemini AI (Google DeepMind)

    Description
    DistributedCompute
    Manager for distributed computing contexts.
    DistributedContext
    Defines the contract for distributed computing contexts.
    DistributedFFT
    Distributed FFT implementation.
    DistributedMonteCarlo
    Distributed Monte Carlo simulations.
    DistributedMonteCarlo.ControlVariateSimulation
    Distributed variance reduction using control variates.
    DistributedMonteCarlo.SamplerFunction
    Functional interface for Monte Carlo samplers.
    LocalDistributedContext
    Local implementation of DistributedContext using ForkJoinPool.
    RemoteDistributedContext
    Remote implementation of DistributedContext (stub).
    SparkDistributedContext
    Apache Spark-based implementation of DistributedContext (stub).
